Class.Name: AVPlayerItem
Class.Description: An object that models the timing and presentation state of an asset during playback.

InstanceMethods.Name: initWithURL:
InstanceMethods.Description: Creates a player item with a specified URL.

InstanceMethods.Name: initWithAsset:
InstanceMethods.Description: Creates a player item for a specified asset.

InstanceMethods.Name: initWithAsset:automaticallyLoadedAssetKeys:
InstanceMethods.Description: Creates a player item with the specified asset and the asset keys to automatically load.

InstanceMethods.Name: stepByCount:
InstanceMethods.Description: Moves the player item’s current time forward or backward by a specified number of steps.

InstanceMethods.Name: seekToTime:completionHandler:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the current playback time to the specified time.

InstanceMethods.Name: seekToTime:toleranceBefore:toleranceAfter:completionHandler:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the current playback time within a specified time bound and invokes the specified block when the seek operation completes or is interrupted.

InstanceMethods.Name: seekToDate:completionHandler:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the current playback time to the time specified by the date object.

InstanceMethods.Name: cancelPendingSeeks
InstanceMethods.Description: Cancels any pending seek requests and invokes the corresponding completion handlers if present.

InstanceMethods.Name: selectMediaOption:inMediaSelectionGroup:
InstanceMethods.Description: Selects a media option in a given media selection group and deselects all other options in that group.

InstanceMethods.Name: selectMediaOptionAutomaticallyInMediaSelectionGroup:
InstanceMethods.Description: Selects the media option in the specified media selection group that best matches the receiver’s automatic selection criteria.

InstanceMethods.Name: currentTime
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the current time of the item.

InstanceMethods.Name: currentDate
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the current time of the item as an NSDate object.

InstanceMethods.Name: accessLog
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns an object that represents a snapshot of the network access log.

InstanceMethods.Name: errorLog
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns an object that represents a snapshot of the error log.

InstanceMethods.Name: addOutput:
InstanceMethods.Description: Adds the specified player item output object to the receiver.

InstanceMethods.Name: removeOutput:
InstanceMethods.Description: Removes the specified player item output object from the receiver.

InstanceMethods.Name: addMediaDataCollector:
InstanceMethods.Description: Adds the specified media data collector to the player item’s collection of media collectors.

InstanceMethods.Name: removeMediaDataCollector:
InstanceMethods.Description: Removes the specified media data collector from the player item’s collection of media collectors.

InstanceMethods.Name: requestPlaybackRestrictionsAuthorization:
InstanceMethods.Description: Determines whether this item is subject to parental restrictions, and, if so, prompts the user to enter the restrictions passcode.

InstanceMethods.Name: cancelPlaybackRestrictionsAuthorizationRequest
InstanceMethods.Description: Cancels a pending authorization request and dismisses the passcode entry, if displayed.

InstanceMethods.Name: requestContentAuthorizationAsynchronouslyWithTimeoutInterval:completionHandler:
InstanceMethods.Description: Presents the user the opportunity to authorize the content for playback.

InstanceMethods.Name: cancelContentAuthorizationRequest
InstanceMethods.Description: Cancels the currently outstanding content authorization request.

InstanceMethods.Name: copy
InstanceMethods.Description: Creates a copy of the object.

InstanceMethods.Name: copyWithZone:
InstanceMethods.Description: Creates a copy of the object with the specified zone.

InstanceProperties.Name: tracks
InstanceProperties.Description: An array of player item track objects.

InstanceProperties.Name: externalMetadata
InstanceProperties.Description: An array of additional metadata for the player item to supplement or replace an asset’s embedded metadata.

InstanceProperties.Name: status
InstanceProperties.Description: The status of the player item.

InstanceProperties.Name: error
InstanceProperties.Description: The error that caused the player item to fail.

InstanceProperties.Name: canPlayReverse
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item can play in reverse.

InstanceProperties.Name: canPlayFastForward
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item can be fast forwarded.

InstanceProperties.Name: canPlayFastReverse
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item can be quickly reversed.

InstanceProperties.Name: canPlaySlowForward
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item can play slower than normal.

InstanceProperties.Name: canPlaySlowReverse
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item can play slowly backward.

InstanceProperties.Name: forwardPlaybackEndTime
InstanceProperties.Description: The time at which forward playback ends.

InstanceProperties.Name: reversePlaybackEndTime
InstanceProperties.Description: The time at which reverse playback ends.

InstanceProperties.Name: canStepForward
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item supports stepping forward.

InstanceProperties.Name: canStepBackward
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item supports stepping backward.

InstanceProperties.Name: currentMediaSelection
InstanceProperties.Description: The current media selections for each of the receiver's media selection groups.

InstanceProperties.Name: variantPreferences
InstanceProperties.Description: The preferences the player item uses when selecting variant playlists.

InstanceProperties.Name: startsOnFirstEligibleVariant
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether playback starts with the first eligible variant that appears in the stream’s main playlist.

InstanceProperties.Name: automaticallyHandlesInterstitialEvents
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the player item automatically plays interstitial events according to server-side directives.

InstanceProperties.Name: translatesPlayerInterstitialEvents
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the player translates interstitial events to interstitial time ranges.

InstanceProperties.Name: interstitialTimeRanges
InstanceProperties.Description: An array of time ranges that identify interstitial content.

InstanceProperties.Name: templatePlayerItem
InstanceProperties.Description: The template player item that initializes this instance.

InstanceProperties.Name: duration
InstanceProperties.Description: The duration of the item.

InstanceProperties.Name: timebase
InstanceProperties.Description: The timebase information for the item.

InstanceProperties.Name: loadedTimeRanges
InstanceProperties.Description: An array of time ranges indicating media data that is readily available.

InstanceProperties.Name: seekableTimeRanges
InstanceProperties.Description: An array of time ranges within which it is possible to seek.

InstanceProperties.Name: playbackLikelyToKeepUp
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item will likely play through without stalling.

InstanceProperties.Name: playbackBufferFull
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the internal media buffer is full and that further I/O is suspended.

InstanceProperties.Name: playbackBufferEmpty
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether playback has consumed all buffered media and that playback will stall or end.

InstanceProperties.Name: preferredPeakBitRateForExpensiveNetworks
InstanceProperties.Description: A limit of network bandwidth consumption by the item when connecting over expensive networks.

InstanceProperties.Name: preferredMaximumResolutionForExpensiveNetworks
InstanceProperties.Description: An upper limit on the resolution of video to download when connecting over expensive networks.

InstanceProperties.Name: textStyleRules
InstanceProperties.Description: An array of text style rules that specify the formatting and presentation of Web Video Text Tracks (WebVTT) subtitles.

InstanceProperties.Name: automaticallyPreservesTimeOffsetFromLive
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the player preserves its time offset from the live time after a buffering operation.

InstanceProperties.Name: recommendedTimeOffsetFromLive
InstanceProperties.Description: A recommended time offset from the live time based on observed network conditions.

InstanceProperties.Name: configuredTimeOffsetFromLive
InstanceProperties.Description: A time value that indicates the offset from the live time to start playback, or resume playback after a seek to positive infinity.

InstanceProperties.Name: presentationSize
InstanceProperties.Description: The size at which the visual portion of the item is presented by the player.

InstanceProperties.Name: preferredMaximumResolution
InstanceProperties.Description: The desired maximum resolution of a video that is to be downloaded.

InstanceProperties.Name: videoApertureMode
InstanceProperties.Description: The video aperture mode to apply during playback.

InstanceProperties.Name: nowPlayingInfo
InstanceProperties.Description: The current now playing information for the player item.

InstanceProperties.Name: appliesPerFrameHDRDisplayMetadata
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the player item applies per-frame HDR display metadata during playback.

InstanceProperties.Name: videoComposition
InstanceProperties.Description: The video composition settings to be applied during playback.

InstanceProperties.Name: customVideoCompositor
InstanceProperties.Description: The custom video compositor.

InstanceProperties.Name: seekingWaitsForVideoCompositionRendering
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item’s timing follows the displayed video frame when seeking with a video composition.

InstanceProperties.Name: audioMix
InstanceProperties.Description: The audio mix parameters to be applied during playback.

InstanceProperties.Name: audioTimePitchAlgorithm
InstanceProperties.Description: The processing algorithm used to manage audio pitch for scaled audio edits.

InstanceProperties.Name: allowedAudioSpatializationFormats
InstanceProperties.Description: The source audio channel layouts the player item supports for spatialization.

InstanceProperties.Name: audioSpatializationAllowed
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the player item allows spatialized audio playback.

InstanceProperties.Name: outputs
InstanceProperties.Description: An array of outputs associated with the player item.

InstanceProperties.Name: mediaDataCollectors
InstanceProperties.Description: The collection of associated media data collectors.

InstanceProperties.Name: preferredPeakBitRate
InstanceProperties.Description: The desired limit, in bits per second, of network bandwidth consumption for this item.

InstanceProperties.Name: preferredForwardBufferDuration
InstanceProperties.Description: The duration the player should buffer media from the network ahead of the playhead to guard against playback disruption.

InstanceProperties.Name: canUseNetworkResourcesForLiveStreamingWhilePaused
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the player item can use network resources to keep the playback state up to date while paused.

InstanceProperties.Name: navigationMarkerGroups
InstanceProperties.Description: The time marker groups that provide ways to navigate the player item’s content.

InstanceProperties.Name: nextContentProposal
InstanceProperties.Description: The item proposed to follow the current content.

InstanceProperties.Name: contentAuthorizedForPlayback
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the content has been authorized by the user.

InstanceProperties.Name: authorizationRequiredForPlayback
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether authorization is required to play the content.

InstanceProperties.Name: applicationAuthorizedForPlayback
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the application can be used to play the content.

InstanceProperties.Name: contentAuthorizationRequestStatus
InstanceProperties.Description: The status of the most recent content authorization request.

InstanceProperties.Name: asset
InstanceProperties.Description: The asset provided during initialization.

InstanceProperties.Name: automaticallyLoadedAssetKeys
InstanceProperties.Description: The array of asset keys to be automatically loaded before the player item is ready to play.

InstanceProperties.Name: externalSubtitleOptionLanguages
InstanceProperties.Description: An array of BCP 47 language codes that supplements the list of subtitle options to be presented to the user.

InstanceProperties.Name: selectedExternalSubtitleOptionLanguage
InstanceProperties.Description: The BCP 47 language code of the external subtitle option language marked in the user interface.

TypeMethods.Name: playerItemWithURL:
TypeMethods.Description: Returns a new player item with a specified URL.

TypeMethods.Name: playerItemWithAsset:
TypeMethods.Description: Returns a new player item for a specified asset.

TypeMethods.Name: playerItemWithAsset:automaticallyLoadedAssetKeys:
TypeMethods.Description: Creates a player item with the specified asset and the asset keys to automatically load.
